alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 07 at 4:33PM MDT until July 07 at 5:00PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Lincoln County in east central Colorado... * Until 500 PM MDT. * At 433 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles west of Forder, or 41 miles south of Limon, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Forder. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
